cyberInputMappingInfo:
</br>3. Cyber Input Variable Mapping Information:</br>
(1) position is mapped to the variable named Elasticity_I with an initial value set to a 1-dimensional float [5]</br>
(2) When the value of Elasticity_I changes, let the animation rerun to the starting point and start with the updated position.</br>

(3) velocity is mapped to the variable named Gravity_I with an initial value set to a 1-dimensional float [5]</br>
(4) When the value of Gravity_I changes, let the animation rerun to the starting point and start with the updated velocity.</br>

(5) acceleration is mapped to the variable named Luminance_I with an initial value set to a 1-dimensional float [5]</br>
(6) When the value of Luminance_I changes, let the animation rerun to the starting point and start with the updated acceleration.</br>

(7) mass is mapped to the variable named Mass_I with an initial value set to a 1-dimensional float [5]</br>
(8) When the value of Mass_I changes, let the animation rerun to the starting point and start with the updated mass.</br>

(9) force is mapped to the variable named Speed_I with an initial value set to a 1-dimensional float [5]</br>
(10) When the value of Speed_I changes, let the animation rerun to the starting point and start with the updated force.</br>
